title: I love this meta where you walk off your base and someone one shots you.
body:
Riot get your fucking heads out of your asses you %%%%%%ed fucks. 
This game is a piece of shit right now. 

I say this with love like your harsh father. 

Stop making this game shit if you want to have jobs. 

You guys have 1 fucking game, if league dies Riot games is over, I will not buy a single game you make in the future if you let this game continue the way it is.

replies.body: Maybe if you didn't let the enemy jungler get to 26 kills in a 30 minute game, or contribute to 15 of those enemy kills.

you got me bruh. 

Looked up my match history. 

I was being bush whacked by a smurf kha'zix who killed me constantly. 

The first time he killed me he was 1/0 and got me with a W, Q auto with dark harvest proc. 
He then proceeded to snowball, the champ can run around the jg with true invisibility constantly as long as he has a bush. 

Any way get out of silver and then we will talk balance.
Assassins would be pretty useless if they couldn't one shot a squishy when they're 3 levels up and full build.

Once upon a time a fed assassin could one shot any squishy with a lead, but it generally required their full kit and not just a Q AA.

I am not just talking about assassins either. A camille will 1 shot you, a jax will 1 shot you, a jhin will one shot you. Everything does too much fucking damage.
If those champions one shot you they are disgustingly ahead.

They are trying their best (by their words).

the game isn't shit, its alot of more balenced then olden days, you can dodge a skillshot, but you can't dodge a point and click stun that delt half your HP (old sion).
this version of the game requires players to have atleast a certain amount of awareness and skill, if you can't dodge a skillshot, your fault, if you can't ward to prevent assassins, your fault.

the game in recent years has gotten more skill required, even if oneshots are present.

also, the game is F2P, no one is asking you to buy anything.

I think you are trolling. 
Back in the day they had problem champs, like old sion, or kassawin, etc. 

Now a days a quarter of the roster 1 shots you no matter what you are playing.
name atleast 10, and I'll answer them by name.
